name: [LD48] - Deeper and Deeper
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare game jam. It's a short dungeon-crawling experience with a splash of turtle-based platforming.

Controls

Keyboard  + Mouse

  • Movement: WSAD
  • Attack: Left Click
  • Pick Up/Drop: E (toggle)
  • Interact: E
  • Flashlight: F

Gamepad

  • Movement - Left Thumbstick
  • Aim - Right Thumbstick
  • Attack - Right Trigger
  • Pick Up/Drop - X
  • Interact - X
  • Flashlight - B
